name: Castlemaze Adventure
overview: From the book "Exploring Adventures on the C64", a slightly different version of the Castlemaze adventure. In the game to start in a forest. Your mission is to explore your surroundings and collect any valuables you find. Your journey will take you to an old castle, full of twisting and turning corridors, horrible sorcerers, and mysterious spiders. Will you unravel all the secrets of the castle, collect all the treasure, and escape alive?
